statements: SELECT * FROM intellectual_property_documents;
SELECT id, document_name FROM intellectual_property_documents WHERE id = 1;
SELECT document_name FROM intellectual_property_documents WHERE document_type = 'Patent';
SELECT * FROM intellectual_property_documents WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT document_name, document_type FROM intellectual_property_documents ORDER BY document_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM intellectual_property_documents WHERE id = 1;
SELECT document_name, document_type FROM intellectual_property_documents WHERE document_type = 'Patent';
SELECT document_name FROM intellectual_property_documents WHERE document_content IS NULL;
SELECT id, document_name FROM intellectual_property_documents ORDER BY document_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS document_count FROM intellectual_property_documents WHERE id > 3;
SELECT * FROM patent_drawings;
SELECT title, image_url FROM patent_drawings WHERE id = 1;
SELECT description, title FROM patent_drawings WHERE id = 2 ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT id, title, image_url FROM patent_drawings WHERE title LIKE '%design%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM copyright_certificates WHERE file_type = 'PDF';
SELECT * FROM patent_drawings WHERE title = 'Drawing 1';
SELECT id, title, description FROM patent_drawings WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM patent_drawings WHERE description LIKE '%innovative%' ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT id, image_url, title FROM patent_drawings WHERE description IS NOT NULL AND image_url LIKE '%.png';
SELECT title, description FROM patent_drawings WHERE title LIKE '%patent%' AND description LIKE '%technology%';
SELECT * FROM images;
SELECT id, name FROM images ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, image_data FROM images WHERE id = '1234';
SELECT * FROM documents WHERE document_type = 'invoice';
SELECT id, title FROM documents ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, name FROM images WHERE id = '123'
SELECT * FROM intellectual_property ORDER BY date_created DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM documents WHERE document_type = 'invoice'
SELECT id, name, image_data FROM images WHERE name LIKE '%cat%'
SELECT * FROM documents WHERE document_type = 'report' LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM patents;
SELECT patent_title, inventor FROM patents WHERE date_filed > '2022-01-01';
SELECT patent_number, patent_description FROM patents WHERE inventor LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM patents ORDER BY date_filed DESC;
SELECT patent_title, inventor FROM patents WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM patents;
SELECT patent_number, patent_title, inventor FROM patents WHERE date_filed <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patent_number, patent_title, inventor FROM patents WHERE inventor LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM patent_images JOIN patents ON patent_images.patent_id = patents.id WHERE image_id > 5;
SELECT certificate_number, certificate_name, registration_date FROM copyrights WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patents WHERE id = 1;
SELECT title, description, patent_number FROM patents WHERE patent_number LIKE 'US%';
SELECT id, title FROM patents WHERE id > 3 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM patents WHERE title LIKE '%software%' AND description LIKE '%technology%';
SELECT id, image_url FROM patents WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM patents ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT title, description FROM patents WHERE id > 10;
SELECT * FROM patent_owners po INNER JOIN patents p ON po.patent_id = p.id WHERE p.title LIKE '%technology%';
SELECT p.title, i.name FROM patents p JOIN inventors i ON p.id = i.id ORDER BY p.id ASC, i.name DESC;
SELECT patent_number, COUNT(patent_id) AS total_owners FROM patent_owners GROUP BY patent_id HAVING COUNT(patent_id) > 2 ORDER BY total_owners DESC;
